alert.note: Alert for Appanoose; Clarke; Davis; Decatur; Lucas; Madison; Mahaska; Marion; Monroe; Poweshiek; Ringgold; Union; Wapello; Warren; Wayne (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 23 at 4:28PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Madison, Wapello, Marion, Davis, southern Warren, Lucas, Monroe, southeastern Poweshiek, Decatur, eastern Union, Wayne, Mahaska, eastern Ringgold, Appanoose and Clarke Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 425 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles west of Melcher-Dallas to 8 miles southwest of Centerville to 5 miles southwest of Kirksville. Movement was northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph with storms, higher than what sustained winds have been this afternoon SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ottumwa, Oskaloosa, Pella, Knoxville, Centerville, Osceola, Chariton, Albia, Bloomfield, Leon, Corydon, Lamoni, Pleasantville, New Sharon, Melcher-Dallas, Eddyville, Sun Valley Lake, Ottumwa Industrial Airport, Knoxville Raceway and Lake Sundown. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 1 and 51. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. If on or near Lake Red Rock Lake or Rathbun Lake, get out of the water and move indoors or inside a vehicle. Remember, lightning can strike out to 10 miles from the parent thunderstorm. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Move to safe shelter now! Do not be caught on the water in a thunderstorm.

area.areaDesc: Appanoose; Clarke; Davis; Decatur; Lucas; Madison; Mahaska; Marion; Monroe; Poweshiek; Ringgold; Union; Wapello; Warren; Wayne
